we need to add a11y to all components, regardless of whether they can be perfectly paired

leadingComments.value: update tab index for all children
when off, removing the tabindex allows the component to never get focus
when interaction is on, we enable the tabindex so users can tab into the items

trailingComments.value: if no item is currently selected, we need to find a candidate

leadingComments.value: gets the first candidate for selection

trailingComments.value: more items are selected, so we find a single item and deselect everything else

leadingComments.value: By default, the last one stays selected
